column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you're looking for traditional Chicago deep dish pizza
column2: this is the place! Not only is their pizza good
column3: but they have a beer called the 312. Being a Californian
column4: we enjoy the 805 beer. The 312 holds it's own. It's a wheat beer that's easy drinking. The place filled up quickly
column6: and atmosphere is loud and family style. Perfect Chicago evening spent here!
